title: White House press corps becoming 'Kremlin-esque,' former press sec Jen Psaki claims
text: Former White House press secretary Jen Psaki criticized the Trump administration's press corps as "Kremlin-esque," claiming it's now filled with "sycophants."
summary: Former White House press secretary Jen Psaki criticized the Trump administration's press corps as "Kremlin-esque," claiming it's now filled with "sycophants."
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
